name: buffer
description:
The buffer command generates circular buffer polygons around points or feature centroids. Useful for:

- Service area analysis
- Impact zone mapping
- Proximity visualization

Supports filtering input features and configurable circle resolution.

options.--segments: Number of segments for circle approximation (default: 16)

output: GeoJSON FeatureCollection with circular polygon buffers around each input point, including original feature properties plus buffer_radius_m and center coordinates.
